name: Tower of cards (Vhalenn)
description:
There is no good way to do it, just try to delay the inevitable fall !

Be careful to not disappoint or you might fall. I mean you will of course fall one day so give your best to stay as long as you can !

You can expand your tower to recruit more employees and generate more money or increase the density of each floor to "optimize" space or even change you employees salary.

But be careful, they might not like what you do !

Done for the LDJAM 50
